description: Transform into a premium e-commerce website for El Panetto TikTok Shop. Create a sleek, modern, trustworthy design that feels high-end and professional. Use elegant black, gold, and white color palette. The site should have smooth animations, generous white space, and feel premium throughout. Include: 1) Sticky navbar with 'El Panetto' logo, navigation links (PanettoTrend, PanettoTees, PanettoBook), TikTok Shop link, Contact/About, shopping cart icon with counter. 2) Striking hero section with headline 'Trendige Produkte für deinen Alltag – direkt von TikTok Shop' and prominent 'Jetzt shoppen' CTA button. 3) Three main category sections with tabs or clear separation. 4) Shopping cart functionality with add/remove items, quantity adjustment, total calculation. 5) Product search functionality. 6) Footer with social links (TikTok, Instagram icons), Impressum, Datenschutz, Newsletter signup form. 7) Trust badges and testimonials section. 8) Fully responsive for mobile and desktop. 9) Stripe payment integration ready. Make it feel like a professional online store that drives conversions.

Create PanettoTrend category section showcasing trendy kitchen gadgets and lifestyle products. Display 6 products in a clean grid layout using these images: /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-1-dNjgX18wpl0Y1v1SK0FwQ.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-2-SrWdOdqaBncVKNwL7wmId.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-3-RCTEmmm2JnCrpBYg8HV5E.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-4-bqhLaATdbetUJAOTHARuh.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-5-7LcRD-yfpqxBcAOUZKCWx.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-6-MrDjYhNOtJPA1NKhI7Nqr.png. Each product should have: product name, price (€19.99-€49.99 range), 'TikTok Viral' badge, star ratings, and 'Schnell kaufen' button that adds to cart. Include hover effects and smooth animations.

Create PanettoTees category section for POD apparel designs. Display 6 products in an attractive grid using these images: /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-1-k-vM9G6q6BxELDngu-vvo.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-2-q9Yvy41Z-1hWQI02Bv9WL.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-3-WGaRycbaae9KqhnqpmF_V.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-4-VQTN1Rx98JVlj5_NYNM0m.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-5-eaK8RGhqp4ab1qv5iMFlO.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-6-dTG8HXVT0qUHUNFy-OXSp.png. Each product should have: design name, price (€24.99-€44.99), size selector (S, M, L, XL, XXL), color options, and 'In den Warenkorb' button. Include a size chart modal or expandable section.

Create PanettoBook category section for eBooks and personal development books. Display 6 products in a professional grid using these cover images: /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-1-4xJZsefvuC4c9EeqFVjtC.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-2-wxUqO0sR82JBX3IC9sqxF.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-3-Ig3O47Kf5sdCKxIsR9jLp.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-4-mprWP_pN5yvyHyANMdeS9.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-5-aqZysJf52i7lZS93gxyiE.png, /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-6-uHtQXweqoxpe3XoroKOIe.png. Each book should have: title focused on mindset/personal development, short description, price (€9.99-€19.99), page count, format (PDF/ePub), and 'Jetzt herunterladen' button. Make it feel like a premium digital bookstore.

Transform the entire website to a luxurious Armani/Mercedes Benz aesthetic with light, sophisticated color palette. Change main background to soft light gray or cream (#F5F5F5 or #FAF9F6). Use generous white space throughout. Add subtle metallic gold accents for premium feeling. Create matte, elegant textures. Keep all existing elements (navbar, hero, categories, footer, cart) but harmonize colors to match the new luxury aesthetic. The site should feel high-end, understated, and sophisticated like luxury brands.

Expand PanettoTrend from 6 to 10 products. Add 4 new kitchen gadgets using these images: /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-7-KcaO2AonncxREKxaPc3xD.png (Digitale Küchenwaage, €34.99, 4.7 stars, TikTok Viral), /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-8-4cZQtg6j6LB28tw4PKvpj.png (Smart Kochthermometer, €42.99, 4.9 stars, TikTok Viral), /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-9-zeVL5LNRwiSvZgoJd0Y61.png (Premium Messerset, €69.99, 4.8 stars, TikTok Viral), /home/user/Images/panetto-trend-gadget-10-N6RTSRW3oNDRaH4tM6kV4.png (Elektrischer Milchaufschäumer, €29.99, 4.6 stars, TikTok Viral). Optimize grid layout for better overview while staying responsive.

Expand PanettoTees from 6 to 10 products. Add 4 new apparel designs using these images: /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-7-4nGRzvY33GhKacqZEQmyG.png (Minimalist Polo, €39.99, sizes S-XXL, 3 colors), /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-8-wz3hW8n8zmxklHaU_TCd_.png (Artistic Oversized Tee, €34.99, sizes S-XXL, 4 colors), /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-9-Y0-QNLiXRG0qSspsIlgnV.png (Graphic Longsleeve, €44.99, sizes S-XXL, 2 colors), /home/user/Images/panetto-tees-design-10-Vekv2stBWypDjExiaedu2.png (Designer Zip Hoodie, €54.99, sizes S-XXL, 3 colors). Optimize grid for better product display.

Expand PanettoBook from 6 to 10 products. Add 4 new eBooks using these covers: /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-7-CgSg6Us3W_DnLZQ6F4t2W.png (Produktivitäts-Journal, €14.99, 180 pages, PDF/ePub), /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-8-N8suiW4sqUxah4VhEUW9_.png (Meditations-Guide, €12.99, 120 pages, PDF/ePub), /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-9-LgNXo7Wf3zd2_wvlta5q1.png (Business Strategie eBook, €19.99, 250 pages, PDF), /home/user/Images/panetto-book-cover-10-zJ-QpMLXdI-poWD-BNDiD.png (Wellness Planner, €16.99, 200 pages, PDF/ePub). Optimize grid layout for premium digital bookstore feel.
